comingSoon.stayTuned: Stay tuned for the revolution of financial intelligence with Divizend!

settings.title: Settings

accountSection.title: Account
accountSection.bottomText: To modify your email address and for other profile settings, please visit app.divizend.com.

settings.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

intro.title: Welcome to Divizend
intro.message: Before we get started, we'd like to inform you about how our AI-powered app works.

disclaimer.title: AI-Native App Disclaimer
disclaimer.message: This app is AI-native. All information entered will be shared with OpenAI to provide you with the best experience. By continuing to use this app, you agree to these terms.

insights.title: Insights

aiContext.questions:
The user sees the following questions:
{{questions}}

insights.explanation: With Divizend, your financial learning is fully personalized. To do this, you need to answer a few questions first, guided by the following. When you tap on a question, you can also generate new ones based on it. If you have several things you want to respond to a question, separate them into multiple answers.

defaultQuestions.question: What are your financial goals, dreams and aspirations?
What is your current financial situation?
Why do you want to learn more about finance?
How do financial topics currently make you feel?
What do you already know about finance?
Which values guide your financial decision-making?
Which financial topics are you interested in?
What do you need to feel financially secure?
In which areas of your financial life do you want to be more independent?
Which financial habits do you want to cultivate?

insights.title: Insights about your financial life
insights.bottomText: Your answers have been reformulated into clear statements about your financial life, which will be used to customize your learning experience. Of course you can also always add and remove insights later.

insights.confirmButton: Happy with these insights? Then let's confirm and continue!

removeInsight.title: Are you sure you want to remove this insight?
removeInsight.titleWithGoals: Are you sure you want to remove this insight and all its associated goals?

goals.title: Learning goals
goals.explanation: Based on the insights about your financial life, let's now determine concrete learning goals for you. You can generate goals for each insight, expand on them for more detail, or remove them if they don't feel relevant to you.

generateButton.title: Tap here to determine goals
generateButton.titleMore: Tap here to determine more goals
